title: Completed PE Summary - Our Miranda
raw_html:
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: Seafalke Shipping Co Ltd
Port of registry: Brixham
Flag: UK
Type: Fish Catching/Processing
Built: 1982
Length overall: 25.28
Gross tonnage: 142.00
Date & Time 14/11/02
Location of incident: Shoreham Harbour Area
Incident Type: Accident to Person
Injuries/ fatalities: 1 fatality
Damage/ Pollution: None

Synopsis

A fisherman was lost over board as the fishing vessel he was working on enetered the harbour in heavy weather.

Action taken:

A letter was sent to the Coroner highlighting the contributing factors to the accident:

  • The casualty was not wearing a lifejacket

  • The casualty was wearing oilskins and wellington boots

  • There was an ebb tide and undercurrent at the harbour

  • The wind conditions would have limited any call for help to be heard

  • The weather and sea conditions would have adversely affected survival time

Synopsis

A fisherman was lost over board as the fishing vessel he was working on enetered the harbour in heavy weather. 

Action taken:

A letter was sent to the Coroner highlighting the contributing factors to the accident: 

  * The casualty was not wearing a lifejacket
